records.question: What is the return policy?
records.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.

records.question: How do I track my order?
records.answer: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email after purchase.

records.question: What payment methods do you accept?
records.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

records.question: How do I contact customer support?
records.answer: You can contact customer support via email at returns@shipping.com.

records.question: Do you offer international shipping?
records.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries.

records.question: How do I change my order?
records.answer: To change your order, please contact customer support as soon as possible.
